name: Alex Johnson
title: Full-Stack Developer & Tech Entrepreneur
bio: Passionate software developer with 10+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading technical teams. I love solving complex problems and creating solutions that make a real impact. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or mentoring aspiring developers.

name: DevCorp Solutions
title: Enterprise Software Development Company
bio: DevCorp Solutions is a leading software development company specializing in enterprise applications, cloud infrastructure, and digital transformation. Founded in 2015, we've helped over 200 companies modernize their technology stack and accelerate their digital initiatives.
